section.title: Linkus email template
section.p: The PBX has a default Linkus email template. You can edit the template according to your needs.

ol.li: Go to Linkus App, click Welcome Email.
On the Send Welocme Email page, click Edit Template.
Go to Linkus Linkus Client Settings , click Edit Template.

On the Edit Email Template page, edit the email subject and email contents.
The variable names are unchangeable. You can adjust the placement of the variables according to your contents.
